name: beachcomb
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to walk along beaches looking for objects of value or interest: Many of us regularly surf, sail, fish, dive, beachcomb or swim along this coast. Some people beachcomb pebbles or driftwood for their holiday souvenirs. Related words
beachcomber
beachcombing
More examplesFewer examplesTeenagers come to the area to beachcomb, camp, hang out and party.As you beachcomb, beware of stepping barefoot on a man-of-war jellyfish, which can deliver a painful sting.She had a large collection of interesting objects such as beachcombed amber and shells.
